languages.text: "Для начала надо понять, как сами ксеносы выбираются отсюда — как просачиваются в Коронус, чтобы грабить, убивать и брать пленных. А когда мы это поймем, то надо будет пробиваться к выходу с боем — для этого уже сейчас надо искать умелых бойцов".

"First, we should establish how the xenos themselves leave this place and slither their way to the Koronus Expanse to pillage, slaughter, and take prisoners. Once we have that information, we will need to fight our way to the exit — and for that to succeed, we should already be looking for capable fighters."
languages.original_text: "Для начала надо понять, как сами ксеносы выбираются отсюда — как просачиваются в Коронус, чтобы грабить, убивать и брать пленных. А когда мы это поймем, то надо будет пробиваться к выходу с боем — для этого уже сейчас надо искать умелых бойцов".

traits.locale_text: "First, we should establish how the xenos themselves leave this place and slither their way to the Koronus Expanse to pillage, slaughter, and take prisoners. Once we have that information, we will need to fight our way to the exit — and for that to succeed, we should already be looking for capable fighters."

Once we have that information, we will need to fight our way to the exit — and for that to succeed, we should already be looking for capable fighters."

"First, we should establish how the xenos themselves leave this place and slither their way to the Koronus Expanse to pillage, slaughter, and take prisoners. Once we have that information, we will need to fight our way to the exit — and for that to succeed, we should already be looking for capable fighters."

Once we have that information, we will need to fight our way to the exit — and for that to succeed, we should already be looking for capable fighters."

Once we have that information, we will need to fight our way to the exit — and for that to succeed, we should already be looking for capable fighters."

"First, we should establish how the xenos themselves leave this place and slither their way to the Koronus Expanse to pillage, slaughter, and take prisoners. Once we have that information, we will need to fight our way to the exit — and for that to succeed, we should already be looking for capable fighters."

languages.text: 「まず確認すべきなのは、異種族どもがこの場所からどうやって脱出し、コロヌス・エクスパンスへと這い出しては、略奪、殺戮、捕虜の拉致を行っているのかということです。その情報が手に入ったら、脱出路を力ずくで切り開かねばなりません。そのためにも、今のうちから有能な戦力を確保しておくべきでしょう」
languages.original_text: "First, we should establish how the xenos themselves leave this place and slither their way to the Koronus Expanse to pillage, slaughter, and take prisoners. Once we have that information, we will need to fight our way to the exit — and for that to succeed, we should already be looking for capable fighters."

traits.locale_text: 「まず確認すべきなのは、異種族どもがこの場所からどうやって脱出し、コロヌス・エクスパンスへと這い出しては、略奪、殺戮、捕虜の拉致を行っているのかということです。その情報が手に入ったら、脱出路を力ずくで切り開かねばなりません。そのためにも、今のうちから有能な戦力を確保しておくべきでしょう」

languages.text: "Zunächst sollten wir herausfinden, wie die Xenos selbst diesen Ort verlassen und sich in die Koronus-Ausdehnung schleichen, um dort zu plündern, zu morden und Gefangene zu nehmen. Sobald wir diese Information haben, müssen wir uns zum Ausgang durch kämpfen – und damit das Erfolg hat, sollten wir bereits jetzt nach fähigen Kämpfern suchen."
languages.original_text: "First, we should establish how the xenos themselves leave this place and slither their way to the Koronus Expanse to pillage, slaughter, and take prisoners. Once we have that information, we will need to fight our way to the exit — and for that to succeed, we should already be looking for capable fighters."

traits.locale_text: "Zunächst sollten wir herausfinden, wie die Xenos selbst diesen Ort verlassen und sich in die Koronus-Ausdehnung schleichen, um dort zu plündern, zu morden und Gefangene zu nehmen. Sobald wir diese Information haben, müssen wir uns zum Ausgang durch kämpfen – und damit das Erfolg hat, sollten wir bereits jetzt nach fähigen Kämpfern suchen."

languages.text: « Je pense que nous devrions tout d'abord comprendre comment les xénos eux-mêmes quittent cet endroit pour piller, massacrer et capturer les habitants des Étendues de Koronus. Une fois que nous disposerons de cette information, nous nous battrons pour nous enfuir. Pour y parvenir, nous devrions d'ores et déjà rassembler des combattants dignes de ce nom. »
languages.original_text: "First, we should establish how the xenos themselves leave this place and slither their way to the Koronus Expanse to pillage, slaughter, and take prisoners. Once we have that information, we will need to fight our way to the exit — and for that to succeed, we should already be looking for capable fighters."

traits.locale_text: « Je pense que nous devrions tout d'abord comprendre comment les xénos eux-mêmes quittent cet endroit pour piller, massacrer et capturer les habitants des Étendues de Koronus. Une fois que nous disposerons de cette information, nous nous battrons pour nous enfuir. Pour y parvenir, nous devrions d'ores et déjà rassembler des combattants dignes de ce nom. »

languages.text: «En primer lugar, deberíamos averiguar cómo abandonan los propios xenos este lugar y reptan hasta la Extensión de Koronus para saquear, masacrar y capturar prisioneros. Cuando dispongamos de esa información, tendremos que abrirnos paso luchando hasta la salida; y si queremos tener éxito, ya deberíamos estar buscando luchadores competentes».
languages.original_text: "First, we should establish how the xenos themselves leave this place and slither their way to the Koronus Expanse to pillage, slaughter, and take prisoners. Once we have that information, we will need to fight our way to the exit — and for that to succeed, we should already be looking for capable fighters."

traits.locale_text: «En primer lugar, deberíamos averiguar cómo abandonan los propios xenos este lugar y reptan hasta la Extensión de Koronus para saquear, masacrar y capturar prisioneros. Cuando dispongamos de esa información, tendremos que abrirnos paso luchando hasta la salida; y si queremos tener éxito, ya deberíamos estar buscando luchadores competentes».

languages.text: “首先，我们得弄清楚那些异形要如何离开这个地方，如何前往科罗努斯扩区进行掠夺、屠杀、俘虏。弄清这件事情之后，我们只要一路杀到出口就可以了。为了实现这个目标，我们应该开始寻找技艺出色的战士。”
languages.original_text: "First, we should establish how the xenos themselves leave this place and slither their way to the Koronus Expanse to pillage, slaughter, and take prisoners. Once we have that information, we will need to fight our way to the exit — and for that to succeed, we should already be looking for capable fighters."

traits.locale_text: “首先，我们得弄清楚那些异形要如何离开这个地方，如何前往科罗努斯扩区进行掠夺、屠杀、俘虏。弄清这件事情之后，我们只要一路杀到出口就可以了。为了实现这个目标，我们应该开始寻找技艺出色的战士。”

languages.text: "Bizzat zenoların buradan nasıl ayrıldığını ve çevreyi yağmalamak, insanları katletmek ve esir almak için Koronus Enginliği'ne nasıl sızdıklarını tespit etmeliyiz. Bunu öğrenir öğrenmez savaşarak çıkışa giden yolu açmamız gerekecek. Başarılı olmak için hünerli savaşçılara ihtiyacımız olacak."
languages.original_text: "First, we should establish how the xenos themselves leave this place and slither their way to the Koronus Expanse to pillage, slaughter, and take prisoners. Once we have that information, we will need to fight our way to the exit — and for that to succeed, we should already be looking for capable fighters."

traits.locale_text: "Öncelikle, bizzat zenoların buradan nasıl ayrıldığını ve çevreyi yağmalamak, insanları katletmek ve esir almak için Koronus Enginliği'ne nasıl sızdıklarını tespit etmeliyiz. Bunu öğrenir öğrenmez çıkışa doğru savaşarak ilerleyip yolumuzu açmamız gerekecek. Başarılı olmak için de hünerli savaşçılara ihtiyacımız olacak."

languages.original_text: "First, we should establish how the xenos themselves leave this place and slither their way to the Koronus Expanse to pillage, slaughter, and take prisoners. Once we have that information, we will need to fight our way to the exit — and for that to succeed, we should already be looking for capable fighters."
